Package guiLayer

Class ProgramArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiLayer.ProgramArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants
    public class ProgramArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants
    ProgramArea, the programArea describes the area where all blocks are placed for the execution of the game.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    group17

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addShapeToProgramArea​(Shape shape)
      Add a shape to the programArea, if the id of the given shape is already present in the programArea that shape will be replaced with the given shape.
      void addToAlreadyFilledInCoordinates​(Shape shape)
      Add the coordinates of the shape to the already filled coordinates, if the id of the given shape is already present the coordinates of that shape will be replaced with the coordinates of the given shape.
      boolean checkIfInProgramArea​(int x)
      Check if the given x coordinate is present in the programArea.
      boolean checkIfPlaceable​(Shape shapeToPlace)
      Check if the given shape can be placed in the programArea.
      void clearAlreadyFilledInCoordinates()
      Remove all alreadyFilledCoordinates
      java.util.Set<ControlShape> getAllChangedControlShapes()
      Retrieve a all ControlShapes in the programArea of which the height has changed.
      java.util.Set<Coordinate> getAlreadyFilledInCoordinates()
      Retrieve a set with all the coordinates that are already occupied by another shape.

      Retrieve the highlighted shape for connections

      Retrieve a shape by its ID
      Shape getShapeFromCoordinate​(int x, int y)
      Retrieve a shape from the given coordinates, return null if no shape is present at these coordinates.

    • Method Detail

      • getShapesInProgramArea

        public java.util.Set<Shape> getShapesInProgramArea()
        Retrieve a set with all the shapes in the programArea
        Returns:
        a set with all the shapes in the programArea

      • clearAlreadyFilledInCoordinates

        public void clearAlreadyFilledInCoordinates()
        Remove all alreadyFilledCoordinates

      • addShapeToProgramArea

        public void addShapeToProgramArea​(Shape shape)
        Add a shape to the programArea, if the id of the given shape is already present in the programArea that shape will be replaced with the given shape. If a shape is added to the programArea it's not yet added to the set of AlreadyFilledCoordinates
        Parameters:
        shape - the shape to add to the programArea. If the shape is null nothing happens.

      • removeShapeFromProgramArea

        public void removeShapeFromProgramArea​(Shape shape)
        Remove the given shape from the programArea and from the alreadyFilledCoordinates.
        Parameters:
        shape -

      • checkIfInProgramArea

        public boolean checkIfInProgramArea​(int x)
        Check if the given x coordinate is present in the programArea.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate to check
        Returns:
        a flag indicating if the given x coordinate is present in the programArea.

      • getShapeFromCoordinate

        public Shape getShapeFromCoordinate​(int x,
                                    int y)
        Retrieve a shape from the given coordinates, return null if no shape is present at these coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the shape
        y - The y coordinate of the shape
        Returns:
        The shape on the given coordinate or null if there is no shape at those coordinates.

      • getShapeById

        public Shape getShapeById​(java.lang.String id)
        Retrieve a shape by its ID
        Parameters:
        id - the id to get the associated shape of
        Returns:
        The shape associated with the given ID or null if no shape with the given ID was found.

      • checkIfPlaceable

        public boolean checkIfPlaceable​(Shape shapeToPlace)
        Check if the given shape can be placed in the programArea.
        Parameters:
        shapeToPlace - the shape to place in the programArea
        Returns:
        a flag indicating if the shape can be placed in the programArea.

        public java.util.Set<Coordinate> getAlreadyFilledInCoordinates()

      • addToAlreadyFilledInCoordinates

        public void addToAlreadyFilledInCoordinates​(Shape shape)
        Add the coordinates of the shape to the already filled coordinates, if the id of the given shape is already present the coordinates of that shape will be replaced with the coordinates of the given shape.
        Parameters:
        shape -

      • removeFromAlreadyFilledInCoordinates

        public void removeFromAlreadyFilledInCoordinates​(Shape shape)
        Remove all coordinates from the given shape from the already filled Coordinates in the programArea
        Parameters:
        shape - the shape to remove the coordinates from.

      • getHighlightedShapeForConnections

      • setHighlightedShapeForConnections

        public void setHighlightedShapeForConnections​(Shape highlightedShape)
        Set the Highlighted shape to which another shape is trying to connect.
        Parameters:
        highlightedShape - The shape that needs to be the highlighted shape for connections.

      • setHighlightedShapeForExecution

        public void setHighlightedShapeForExecution​(Shape shape)
        Set the shape highlighted for execution
        Parameters:
        shape - The shape highlighted for execution, if the given shape is null the highlighting will be cleared.
